Package View

Class GraphicalIntersection

java.lang.Object
View.GraphicalIntersection
public class GraphicalIntersection extends Object
GraphicalIntersection is the class that displays graphically a location on the drawn map. A graphical intersection is composed of:
  • An intersection.
  • A point (coordinates of the position on screen).
  • An indication about if it is selected or not (used when adding a request).
  • An indication about if a mouse is over, when the intersection is a stop in a tour (used when a tour is computed).
  • A number that indicates its position if the intersection is a stop in a tour.
Graphical Intersections are created to display the intersection.
It can be style differently for particular intersections like stops or tour departure. It can also be bigger or in red when there is an interaction with the mouse (click or over).
Author:
H4122
See Also:
Intersection, Stop, DrawnMap

  • Constructor Details

    • GraphicalIntersection

      public GraphicalIntersection​(Intersection intersection, Point coordinates)
      Class constructor. Creates a graphical intersection with the intersection and the coordinates in parameters. The graphical intersection is not selected and the mouse is not over it. The visiting number is 0 by default. It won't appear if the intersection is not a stop in a tour.
      Parameters:
      intersection - The intersection associate to the graphical intersection.
      coordinates - The coordinates of the position on screen. *

    • draw

      public void draw​(Graphics g)
      Represents graphically the intersection on a map. It is a black oval. It is red when selected.
      Parameters:
      g - an object of the graphics class.

    • drawDeparture

      public void drawDeparture​(Graphics g, DrawnMap drawnMap)
      Represents graphically a particular intersection which is the tourDeparture with an icon.
      Parameters:
      g - an object of the graphics class.
      drawnMap - the graphical map containing the tourDeparture.
      See Also:
      Tour.tourDeparture

    • drawStopRequest

      public void drawStopRequest​(Graphics g, String type, Color color)
      Represents graphically a particular intersection which is a stop in a tour. A different color is determined for every stop. The shape will be different depending on the type.
      Parameters:
      g - an object of the graphics class.
      type - defined whether it's a delivery or a pickup stop.
      color - defined the color of the graphical stop.
      See Also:
      Stop

    • drawBiggerPoint

      public void drawBiggerPoint​(Graphics g, String type)
      Represents graphically a stop when a user clicks on it. The oval is bigger and red. The shape will be different depending on the type.
      Parameters:
      g - an object of the graphics class.
      type - defined whether it's a delivery or a pickup stop.
      See Also:
      Stop

    • drawOver

      public void drawOver​(Graphics g)
      Draws a number that indicates the visiting order of the stop in a tour.
      Parameters:
      g - an object of the graphics class.
      See Also:
      Stop, Tour
